name: Mr. Ski
description:
Thinking of releasing this as an app - still a work-in-progress - feedback is very welcome! Inspired by the classic Windows 3.0 game SkiFree.

Works best on a smartphone

Controls

Slide your finger/mouse across the screen to move the skier. Avoid obstacles and collect bonuses.

Built using flowlab.io

Having trouble playing the game? Play at flowlab.io instead
